page.title: 03SKYBURRIOWE FARM
page.content: In studying our D.block we camped at Skyburriowe farm.Mr.Benny,his brother, wife and female employee work the farm. .It is a{250 acre dairy farm } with{80 milking cows, 150 beef cows,a {donkey and a bull which was won in a {raffle.}The cows are milked in a {modern parlour}twice a day and produce {1100 litres}of milk per day which is collected daily by a tanker.Mr.Benny tries to grow as much animal food as he can.In the Spring and Summer they harvest as much{grass}as possible to use as{silage}to feed to the cows in the winter.They also grow{corn}which they grind themselves.It is very well equipped with{modern machinery}and has a collection of old tractors.Farming is very hard work.The farmer works very long hours to look after the animals and often{ gets up in the {middle of the night to nurse them.
